content:
PackWebRequest Class

In this Article

Makes a request to an entire PackagePart or to a PackagePart in a package, identified by a pack URI.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class PackWebRequest : System.Net.WebRequest

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MarshalByRefObject
  • System.Net.WebRequest
  • PackWebRequest

Inherited Members

Remarks

System.IO.Packaging APIs use a defined pack uri syntax to refer to parts that are contained in a package.

For more information about the abstract class that this class derives from and the operation of requests and responses, see WebRequest.

Properties summary

CachePolicy

Gets or sets the RequestCachePolicy.
ConnectionGroupName

Gets or sets the name of the connection group.
ContentLength

Gets or sets the Content-length HTTP header.
ContentType

Gets or sets the Content-type HTTP header.
Credentials

Gets or sets the authentication credentials.
Headers

Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.
Method

Gets or sets the protocol method to use with the pack URI request.
PreAuthenticate

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate the request.
Proxy

Gets or sets the network proxy for Internet access.
RequestUri

Gets the URI of the resource associated with the request.
Timeout

Gets or sets the length of time before the request times out.
UseDefaultCredentials

Gets or sets the default authentication credentials.

Methods summary

GetInnerRequest()

Gets the inner WebRequest.
GetRequestStream()

Do not useâ€”GetRequestStream is not supported by PackWebRequest.
GetResponse()

Returns the response stream for the request.

Properties

  • CachePolicy

    Gets or sets the RequestCachePolicy.

    public override System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy CachePolicy { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RequestCachePolicy

      The RequestCachePolicy to use with pack URI web request.

    Exceptions

    • WebException

      The specified RequestCachePolicy to set is not valid.

    Remarks

    The CachePolicy property is distinct from the CachePolicy of the inner WebRequest returned by the GetInnerRequest method.

  • ConnectionGroupName

    Gets or sets the name of the connection group.

    public override string ConnectionGroupName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The connection group name.

    Remarks

    The ConnectionGroupName property enables the request to be associated with a connection group. A connection group is useful when application makes requests to the same server for different users.

    The ConnectionGroupName property is an empty string if the request resolves from the PackageStore cache.

    The ConnectionGroupName property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • ContentLength

    Gets or sets the Content-length HTTP header.

    public override long ContentLength { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int64

      The content length, in bytes.

    Exceptions

    • NotSupportedException

      Set is not supported, PackWebRequest is read-only.

    Remarks

    Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the uniform resource identifier (URI). For most traditional purposes (such as estimating the size of POST information), there is no need for this property.

    ContentLength returns 0 if the request resolves from the PackageStore cache.

    The ContentLength property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • ContentType

    Gets or sets the Content-type HTTP header.

    public override string ContentType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The contents of the header.

    Remarks

    Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the uniform resource identifier (URI). For most purposes (such as determining the type of POST information), there is no use for this property.

    ContentType returns an empty string if the request resolves from the PackageStore cache.

    The ContentType property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • Credentials

    Gets or sets the authentication credentials.

    public override System.Net.ICredentials Credentials { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ICredentials

      The authentication credentials to use with the request.

    Remarks

    Requests to the package cache use their own cached credentials.

    The Credentials property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • Headers

    Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.

    public override System.Net.WebHeaderCollection Headers { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • WebHeaderCollection

      A header collection object.

    Remarks

    Package cache requests include a valid but otherwise empty header collection in their requests.

    The Headers property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • Method

    Gets or sets the protocol method to use with the pack URI request.

    public override string Method { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The protocol method name that performs this request.

    Remarks

    The Method property returns an empty string if the request resolves from the PackageStore cache. The Method property is only set when request references an external Web request, such as http or ftp.

    The Method property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • PreAuthenticate

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate the request.

    public override bool PreAuthenticate { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to send a WWW-authenticate HTTP header with the initial request; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The PreAuthenticate property returns false for requests resolved from the PackageStore cache; there is no pre-authentication scheme for the pack URI protocol.

    The PreAuthenticate property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • Proxy

    Gets or sets the network proxy for Internet access.

    public override System.Net.IWebProxy Proxy { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • IWebProxy

      The WebProxy to use for Internet access.

    Remarks

    The Proxy property is shared with the inner WebRequest (GetInnerRequest).

  • RequestUri

    Gets the URI of the resource associated with the request.

    public override Uri RequestUri { get; }

    Property Value

    • Uri

      The uniform resource identifier (URI) of the resource associated with the request.

  • Timeout

    Gets or sets the length of time before the request times out.

    public override int Timeout { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The number of milliseconds to wait before the request times out.

    Remarks

    Requests to the package cache do not time out. For requests that resolve from the PackageStore cache, Timeout returns a value of â€“1.

    The Timeout property is shared with the inner request (GetInnerRequest).

  • UseDefaultCredentials

    Gets or sets the default authentication credentials.

    public override bool UseDefaultCredentials { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      The default authentication credentials to use with the pack URI request.

Methods

  • GetInnerRequest()

    Gets the inner WebRequest.

    public System.Net.WebRequest GetInnerRequest ();

    Returns

    • System.Net.WebRequest

      A WebRequest created from the inner-URI if the request resolves to a valid transport protocol such http or ftp; or a WebRequest created with a null-URI if the request resolves from the PackageStore cache.

    Exceptions

    • NotSupportedException

      The inner URI does not resolve to a valid transport protocol such as http for ftp, nor can the request be resolved from the PackageStore.

    Remarks

    The GetInnerRequest is provided for advanced scenarios only and is not needed for normal operation.

  • GetRequestStream()

    Do not useâ€”GetRequestStream is not supported by PackWebRequest.

    public override System.IO.Stream GetRequestStream ();

    Returns

    • Stream

      If GetRequestStream is called, a NotSupportedException is thrown.

    Exceptions

    • NotSupportedException

      Occurs on any call to GetRequestStream. The pack URI protocol does not support writing.

    Remarks

    GetRequestStream exists to implement the contract required by the abstract base class. The pack URI protocol does not support writing.

  • GetResponse()

    Returns the response stream for the request.

    public override System.Net.WebResponse GetResponse ();

    Returns

    • WebResponse

      The response stream for the request.

    Remarks

    Per the signature of the base class, GetResponse returns value of type WebResponse. The return value it is actually of type PackWebResponse specific to the response of the pack URI protocol.

    The Close method should be called when the application is finished with the WebResponse stream.
